Accordion Value Add 
•
Set up processes in place and implemented multiple accounting related activities, such as Invoicing and Journal Entries Management, Reconciliation and 
Reporting, post the initial onboarding sessions to understand the existing processes and the pain-points.
•
Prepared Inventory reports for all the subsidiaries of the client, that helped the company in centrally reconciling the inventory at a parent level on a real-time 
basis
•
Worked on running daily consolidation of subsidiaries’ transactions in a seamless and efficient manner, during the month-end closure
•
Worked on invoicing activities to update the accounts payables real-time, thus enabling the Financial Controller to close the books within first week of the 
month
•
Setup a process to quality check all the customer and internal invoices, enabling quick follow ups with the customers and subsidiaries in case of any issues 
in the invoices
Situation
•
Company was dependent on multiple personnel for their accounting related activities, resulting in inefficiencies in managing the processes, leading to an 
overburden of administrative work for the Financial Controller, to gather the inputs and generate the reports/statements to close the books at the end of 
the month. Also, there was an opportunity to voucher the invoices/POs on a more real-time basis, to avoid workload towards the end of the month. 
•
Partnered with the client to streamline their accounting processes and deliver on various workstreams, to ensure a smooth and seamless accounts closure 
at the end of the month
Accounting solutions for medical equipment manufacturer
3
Impact
•
Consolidation and Reconciliation activities conducted centrally, enabled time and cost savings, leading to faster and more efficient month-closure. 
•
Regular update of all the activities including invoicing helped the client in closing their books within 1st week, allowing additional time for other accounting 
and financial analyses
